alert.note: Alert for Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:09PM CDT until May 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NESS AND WESTERN RUSH COUNTIES... At 808 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alexander, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Crosse, Bazine, McCracken, Rush Center, Liebenthal, Alexander, Nekoma and Hargrave. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
